title: ESAs set out Joint Work Programme for 2016 (ESMA - European Securities and Markets Authority) ...
text: ( Source : ESMA - European Securities and Markets Authority ) 05/10/ 2015 The Joint Committee of the European Supervisory Authorities ( EBA , ESMA and EIOPA ) published today its Work Programme for the upcoming year. Throughout 2016, the Joint
